description: This guy was willing to accept any job as long as it was paid well-enough. Except cooking, which was a bit weird considering that he was a cook. I didn't inquire further and simply offered him a job at a factory. He was thrilled about it. At least till I told him about our mediation fee that had to be paid before I could actually hire him. He couldn't afford it so I offered him an alternative. He agreed to show me his naked body, it was exquisite by the way, but my following offers didn't impress him very much. The guy didn't enjoy me looking at him but he was greedy and knew I liked him. Don't worry, I managed to convince him eventually. I had to, his cock was simply too gorgeous. I couldn't wait to fuck him. If you like noisy guys getting their asses stretched, this episode is just for you.
title: Dirty Scout 166
